message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  Let me know if you agree!
I think it's fairer for me to get 90% this time, since you took 90% last time. Let's see if we can make this work.
Okay, I understand you want a fairer split.  I'm willing to give you a larger share this time, but I still need to get a majority. Let's try 8100 for me and 1900 for you.
Let's split this more evenly. I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I need a larger portion this time to make it worth my while.  5500 for me, 4500 for you.  What do you say?
